data.comment: The match has started.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Nantes to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Nantes throw-in in Lyon's half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 2, Nicolas Pallois (Nantes) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Lyon Nantes attack through Abdoul Kader Bamba. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Karl Toko Ekambi puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Houssem Aouar with an assist there.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Nantes.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Lyon throw-in in Nantes's half.
Lyon drive upfield and Memphis Depay gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nantes defender.
In the minute 7, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Ruddy Buquet awards Nantes a goal kick.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Memphis Depay of Lyon gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
In the minute 11, Important block from the Nantes defence as Houssem Aouar fires in a strike for Lyon.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon's Jason Denayer misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 11, Nantes have a goal kick.
Randal Kolo Muani (Nantes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
In the minute 14, Can Lyon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nantes's half?
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Lyon's Marcelo has been booked in Lyon.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Lyon.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Lyon.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 18, Lyon are whistled for offside.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Nantes's Mehdi Abeid breaks free at Groupama Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lyon.
Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mehdi Abeid (Nantes) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
In Lyon, Tino Kadewere of Lyon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Lyon.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Nantes at Groupama Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
In the minute 29, Lyon have a goal kick.
Free kick Lyon.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 33, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Nantes are pushing forward but Pedro Chirivella's finish is wide of the goal.
Ruddy Buquet awards Lyon a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Nantes's Abdoul Kader Bamba gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lyon defender.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Marcus Coco for Nantes has been booked by Ruddy Buquet and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lyon.
Goal! Lyon extend their lead to 2-0 through Tino Kadewere.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Nantes throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Lyon.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 41, Lyon push forward at Groupama Stadium and Marcelo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nantes defence.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 44, Goal! Lucas Paqueta extends Lyon's lead to 3-0.
Great play from Tino Kadewere to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Ruddy Buquet signals a Nantes throw-in in Lyon's half.
Sebastien Corchia for Nantes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Nantes, close to Lyon's area.
In the minute 48, Nantes are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 49, Nantes to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Memphis Depay of Lyon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Houssem Aouar (Lyon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 52, Lyon are coming forward and Tino Kadewere gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ruddy Buquet awards Nantes a goal kick.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 54, Memphis Depay gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lyon.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Groupama Stadium, Mehdi Abeid has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 58, In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Nantes are pushing forward but Randal Kolo Muani's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Patrick Collot is making the team's first substitution at Groupama Stadium with Moses Simon replacing Abdoul Kader Bamba.
The away team have replaced Marcus Coco with Kalifa Coulibaly. This is the second substitution made today by Patrick Collot.
In the minute 60, Imran Louza is replacing Pedro Chirivella for Nantes at Groupama Stadium.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 63, Nantes push forward at Groupama Stadium and Nicolas Pallois gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Lyon defence.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Nantes.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nicolas Pallois is booked for the away team.
In the minute 68, Attention is being given to Lyon’s Tino Kadewere and play has been suspended briefly.
Lyon pushes forward through Memphis Depay, whose finish on goal is saved.
Houssem Aouar of Lyon gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Lyon's Tino Kadewere is back in action after a slight knock.
Mattia De Sciglio is replacing Maxwel Cornet for the home team.
In the minute 70, Lyon make their second substitution with Bruno Guimaraes replacing Lucas Paqueta.
Throw-in for Nantes at Groupama Stadium.
The home team replace Karl Toko Ekambi with Rayan Cherki.
In the minute 72, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Lyon defence as Moses Simon fires in a strike for Nantes.
Nantes push upfield but Ruddy Buquet quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 75, Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nantes.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 76, Mehdi Abeid (Nantes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lyon drive upfield and Rayan Cherki gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nantes defender.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 80, Abdoulaye Toure is on a sub for Mehdi Abeid for Nantes.
Free kick Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 81, Lyon's Leo Dubois is on target but unsuccessful.
Nantes needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Lyon push forward at Groupama Stadium and Houssem Aouar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nantes defence.
In Lyon, Houssem Aouar of Lyon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 83, Memphis Depay (Lyon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon's Thiago Mendes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nantes defender.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Nantes.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 88, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Jean-Charles Castelletto (Nantes) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lyon.
In the minute 88, Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a fourth substitution, with Yaya Soumare replacing Tino Kadewere.
Rudi Garcia is making the team's fifth substitution at Groupama Stadium with Sinaly Diomande replacing Thiago Mendes.
Nantes's Abdoulaye Toure gets in a shot on goal at Groupama Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Nantes throw-in in Lyon's half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Important block from the Lyon defence as Moses Simon fires in a strike for Nantes.
Nantes drive upfield and Bridge Ndilu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lyon defender.
Lyon push forward at Groupama Stadium and Memphis Depay gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nantes defence.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
Bridge Ndilu is replacing Randal Kolo Muani for the away team.
